CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_training_menu
CEEvent.Text: You decide to teach {CAPTIVE_NAME} to better obey your commands. What approach do you take?

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_training_menu_exhausted

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_humiliate_bitch

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_humiliate_drug

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_humiliate_mindbroken

You tell your troops that they have two hours to coat every inch of her body in cum and she squeals in delight. Option.OptionText: Is there any point to this?

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_torture_whipping
CEEvent.Text: You chain {CAPTIVE_NAME} to a post as {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}she struggles. Taking a long, vicious-looking whip from your pack, you begin carefully applying it to her back and buttocks, taking care to let each stripe rest long enough that she can't get used to the pain. Her screams are terrible to hear, but by the time you are done she's incoherently begging you to stop, gibbering as she promises she'll do whatever you want.{?}he struggles. Taking a long, vicious-looking whip from your pack, you begin carefully applying it to his back and buttocks, taking care to let each stripe rest long enough that he can't get used to the pain. His screams are terrible to hear, but by the time you are done he's incoherently begging you to stop, gibbering as he promises he'll do whatever you want.{\?}

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_torture_bondage

Her screams turn to soft sobs over the course of several hours, and when at last you free her she finds her limbs temporarily unable to obey.{?}He screams as you tighten his bonds just past the point of pain, and then just a little tighter still, then leave him there to consider how he has displeased you. CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_torture_horse
CEEvent.Text: You drag {CAPTIVE_NAME} to the stables and lock {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her to a wooden horse. At first she seems merely afraid, but as you lead a stallion towards her naked body she begins screaming incoherently for mercy. The creature has quite a bit of trouble entering her, and in the end it's necessary for you to guide it in, but once it finds a welcoming hole it thrusts mightily, savaging her helpless body. It takes only a few minutes to finish, spurting an ocean of milky seed into her, but in that time she has screamed herself hoarse and then lost consciousness. You're confident she'll remember the lesson when she wakes.{?}him to a wooden horse. The creature has quite a bit of trouble entering him, and in the end it's necessary for you to guide it in, but once it finds a welcoming hole it thrusts mightily, savaging his helpless body. It takes only a few minutes to finish, spurting an ocean of milky seed into him, but in that time he has screamed himself hoarse and then lost consciousness. You're confident he'll remember the lesson when he wakes.{\?}

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_torture_mindbroken
CEEvent.Text: You chain {CAPTIVE_NAME} to a post, and she doesn't struggle, eagerly thrusting her arms into the restraints. As you begin whipping her she smiles, earnestly begging you to hit her harder, to tear her flesh apart and destroy her body for your pleasure. You don't think she's learning anything from this, though the agonized, terrified expression in her eyes is a sharp contrast to her words and actions.

Option.OptionText: Is there any point to this?

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_unconscious_captive
CEEvent.Text: As {CAPTIVE_NAME} slowly moves to follow you, {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}she staggers and collapses, breathing only feebly as the wounds and bruises on her abused body take their toll. There's only so much a woman can take, after all... Unless she's faking to avoid further punishment...{?}he staggers and collapses, breathing only feebly as the wounds and bruises on his abused body take their toll. There's only so much a man can take, after all... Unless he's faking to avoid further punishment...{\?}

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_unconscious_captive_mindbroken
CEEvent.Text: As {CAPTIVE_NAME} slowly moves to follow you, she staggers and collapses, breathing only feebly as the wounds and bruises on her abused body take their toll. Within moments she stands again, almost mechanically, and smiles at you, begging you to fuck her worthless holes. The usual hatred in her eyes is gone, replaced with a deep exhaustion. You're not sure she can take much more of this.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_dead_captive
CEEvent.Text: As {CAPTIVE_NAME}'s horribly exhausted body slowly moves to follow you, {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}she collapses. Too late, you realize she isn't responding at all. You've pushed her body too hard, and it has breathed its last. Perhaps next time you'll be a little more merciful...{?}he collapses. Too late, you realize he isn't responding at all. You've pushed his body too hard, and it has breathed its last. Perhaps next time you'll be a little more merciful...{\?}

Option.OptionText: Let the crows feast on {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her{?}his{\?} corpse.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_dead_captive_mindbroken
CEEvent.Text: As {CAPTIVE_NAME}'s horribly exhausted body slowly moves to follow you, she collapses. Too late, you realize she isn't responding at all. For the first time since you fed her the potion that broke her mind her expression is peaceful, satisfied. You've pushed her body too hard, and though the potion forced her to be obedient to her final breath, in death she is at last free of its compulsion.

Option.OptionText: Let the crows feast on {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her{?}his{\?} corpse.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_new_captive
CEEvent.Text: You notice {CAPTIVE_NAME}'s exhausted body is covered in bruises and cuts from {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her{?}his{\?} ordeal. You may want to consider giving them a few days to rest first - there's only so much a body can take, after all.
